branchCategory.name: AK3542/AK4542 Diaphragm Valves for General Applications, Air Operated Type
branchCategory.description: The Series AK Diaphram Valve is designed for use in a wide variety of applications, from semiconductor to general. Multiple port available in various configurations: compression, Rc, R, NPT.
